content: Home About Me Publications Research Lab Activities Teaching Yijie (Lina) Mao Yijie (Lina) Mao Assistant Professor Network Intelligence Center (NICE) School of Information Science and Technology (SIST) ShanghaiTech University Address: Room 302I, SIST Building 2 393 Middle Huaxia Road, Pudong District Shanghai 201210, China Email: maoyj@shanghaitech.edu.cn TEL: +86-21-20684454 I am an Assistant Professor in the Network Intelligence Center (NICE), School of Information Science and Technology (SIST) at the ShanghaiTech University. Previously, I was a post-doctoral research fellow in The University of Hong Kong and Communications and Signal Processing Group at Imperial College London, under the guidance of Prof. Bruno Clerckx (IEEE Fellow). I obtained my Ph.D. in Electrical and Electronic Engineering from The University of Hong Kong, under the supervision of Prof. Victor O.K. Li (IEEE Life Fellow).
